communities.name: Ashton Lakes
communities.headline: Stunning New Homes For Sale Near Lake Murray
communities.description: Ashton Lakes in Lexington, conveniently located off I-20, offers easy commutes to downtown Columbia and is close to shopping, dining, and Lake Murray recreation. Ashton Lakes residents will enjoy the pool, cabana, and winding sidewalks, and select homesites will feature lakefront living! Home designs will include one-and-two-story plans featuring open living areas and dedicated work or learn-from-home spaces like lofts and home offices, gorgeous kitchens, and spa-like baths. Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Autumn Pond
communities.headline: New Construction Homes For Sale In Richland County
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Autumn Pond, Blythewood's premier new community featuring available waterfront homesites.  Autumn Pond's incredible location allows for easy commutes and is close to dining, entertainment, shopping, and recreation. Plus, students will attend sought after Richland Two schools, all close by, including the elementary and middle school less than 1.5 miles from Autumn Pond. Homes will feature three to five bedrooms, gorgeous kitchens, and spa-like baths. Don't miss your opportunity to be the first to purchase a new home at Autumn Pond. Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Cobblestone Park
communities.headline: Now selling!
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to build new homes in Cobblestone Park, an established gated, golf course community near Northeast Columbia in Blythewood featuring beautiful homes and open green space. Only six opportunities for a new home are available and residents will enjoy world-class amenities in a one-of-a-kind location with golf, swimming, tennis, playground, and on-site security.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Hadleigh Park
communities.headline: Homes Minutes From Lake Murray And Top-Rated Schools
communities.description: 100% USDA financing is available for qualified buyers!*Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Hadleigh Park. Located only minutes from Lake Murray, top-rated schools, shopping, dining, and other conveniences, Hadleigh Park will feature some of Eastwood's most popular home designs. Homes will feature up to five bedrooms, gorgeous interior details, and room for dedicated home office spaces plus stunning kitchens and spa-like baths. *See New Home Specialist for more details.

communities.name: Kensington Place Townhomes
communities.headline: Conveniently Located Homes Near Downtown Lexington, SC
communities.description: Welcome Home to Kensington Place Townhomes, where location and contemporary craftsman architecture meet unparalleled convenience. Situated in an ideal in-town location, residents will enjoy restaurants, shopping, recreation, and entertainment just minutes away. With designer features, one-car garages, and limited availability, Kensington Place Townhomes in Lexington offers the perfect blend of maintenance-free lifestyle and exclusivity, making it the ideal choice for those seeking a modern, vibrant, and welcoming neighborhood to call home.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Riverside
communities.headline: Homes Near Top-Rated Schools and More!
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Riverside, located on Corley Mill Road in Lexington, across the street from River Bluff High School. Home designs will include one-and-two-story plans featuring open living spaces and spaces for working and learning from home with many designer options to personalize your home. Plus, Riverside is close to I-20 with top-rated schools, shopping, dining, and other conveniences just a short drive away.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: The Village at Horse Creek
communities.headline: Now Selling: New Homes in Aiken, SC!
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is excited to announce The Village at Horse Creek! This neighborhood is located in the Graniteville area, an easy commute from Aiken, Augusta, and Fort Eisenhower. To get first access to these beautiful 4-5 bedroom homes, join our VIP list and stay up-to-date on all the latest at Village of Horse Creek!

communities.name: True Cedar at Woodside Plantation
communities.headline: Now Selling- Schedule your visit today!
communities.description: True Cedar at Woodside Plantation is an established gated, golf course community located in the heart of Aiken, South Carolina. Limited to only twelve new home opportunities, residents at True Cedar at Woodside Plantation will enjoy world-class amenities in a one-of-a-kind location with golf, swimming, tennis, clubhouses, and on-site security. True Cedar at Woodside Plantation will feature some of Eastwood's most popular home designs and will include first-floor primary suites, golf course and basement homesites, spacious kitchens, spa-like baths, and thoughtfully designed gathering spaces. Homeowners will also have the opportunity to visit the Eastwood Homes Design Center to personalize their homes from the ground up.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Woodleigh Park at Lake Carolina
communities.headline: Basement Homes In An Amenity-Packed Community On A Private Lake
communities.description: Woodleigh Park at Lake Carolina is a master-planned community with a private 200-acre freshwater lake, six miles of shoreline, and 30 miles of winding bike trails. Residents will also enjoy a dog park, multiple swimming pools, and tennis courts. Lake Carolina is home to its very own Town Center, award-winning schools, and Columbia's newest YMCA. Lake Carolina's distinctive neighborhoods offer a sense of community and the best resort-style living to the people who are fortunate to call it home. Schedule your visit today!

homes_rtb.unique_features: Formal living and dining roomKitchen with island and  pantryUpstairs loft areaAll bedrooms are located on the second floorOptional covered porch, screen porch, or sunroomOptional third-floor bonus room or bedroom with a full bath

homes_rtb.description: The Edinburg is a two-story, four-bedroom, three-and-a-half-bath home with a first-floor primary suite, spacious family room, kitchen with island and separate breakfast area, and first-floor laundry. The second floor features a loft area and three bedrooms, all with walk-in closets and one with its own bathroom. The other two bedrooms feature a Jack and Jill bath.Options available to personalize this home include an optional island layout in the kitchen, several primary bath layouts, a garage storage area, and a covered porch or screen porch.
homes_rtb.unique_features: First-floor primary suiteLoft areaOptional garage storageOptional covered porch or screen porch

homes_rtb.description: The Raleigh is a two-story, four-bedroom, two-and-a-half-bath home with a first-floor primary bedroom, formal dining room, two-story family room, and a kitchen with an island and pantry. The second floor features an upstairs loft area, three additional bedrooms, and a full bath.Options to personalize this home include an additional bedroom upstairs, an expanded loft area, an enclosed bonus room, dual primary suites, a Jack and Jill bathroom, and a sunroom, screen porch, or covered porch.
homes_rtb.unique_features: First-floor primary bedroomTwo-story family roomUpstairs loft areaOptional fifth bedroomOptional dual primary suitesOptional bonus room or expanded loft areaOptional Jack and Jill bathOptional covered porch, screen porch, or sunroom

homes_rtb.description: The Davidson is a two-story, five-bedroom, three-bath home with a formal living room, formal dining room, spacious family room, kitchen with island and pantry, separate breakfast area, and first-floor guest suite with a full bath. The second floor features four bedrooms, including the primary suite, a hall bath, a large laundry room, and a loft area.Options available to personalize this home include an office with French doors in lieu of the formal living room, a first-floor powder room or additional closet, a designer kitchen option, an alternate kitchen layout with a separate butler's pantry, sunroom, screen porch, or covered rear porch, luxury primary bath options, a Jack and Jill bath option, and an optional third floor with bedroom and full bath.

homes_rtb.description: The Hamilton is a two-story, three-bedroom, two-and-a-half-bath home with a three-car tandem garage, formal living room, formal dining room, oversized kitchen with a large island and walk-in pantry, upstairs loft, and spacious bedrooms with large closets.Options to personalize your home include a covered rear porch, screen porch, or sunroom, office with French doors in lieu of the formal living room, den or guest suite with full bath in lieu of the third car tandem garage bay, informal dining extension, optional butler's pantry, optional Jack and Jill bath on the second floor, bedroom four on the second floor, third-floor bedroom and full bath option, and several primary bath layouts.

homes_rtb.description: The Atherton is a two-story, five-bedroom, three-bath home with a formal dining room, spacious family room and kitchen, first-floor bedroom and bath, and second floor with four bedrooms, including the primary suite.Options available to personalize this home include a sunroom, covered porch, or screen porch, an office with French doors, a sitting area in the primary bedroom, two loft area layouts, and the third floor with a bonus room or bedroom and full bath.

homes_rtb.description: The Fenwick is a three-bedroom, two-bath, ranch-style home with a split bedroom design, a spacious and open family room, a breakfast area, and a kitchen with an island and walk-in pantry. This home also features a separate laundry room, a first-floor primary bedroom, and a covered rear porch.Options available to personalize this home include an office in lieu of one of the secondary bedrooms, the primary bedroom closet to open into the laundry room, and an optional second floor with additional bedrooms, a bath, a loft area, oversized unfinished storage, or a finished media room.

homes_rtb.description: The McDowell is a two-story, four-bedroom, three-and-half-bath home with a first-floor primary suite, formal dining room, two-story family room, three spacious upstairs bedrooms, two additional baths, an oversized bonus room, and an unfinished storage area.Options available to personalize this home include an alternate kitchen layout with a butler's pantry and walk-in pantry, a guest suite with a full bath or an office in lieu of the formal dining room, a sunroom, screen porch, or covered rear porch, an upstairs loft area, a media room, and an upstairs primary suite.

homes_rtb.description: The Mayfair is a three-bedroom, two-bath, ranch-style home with a first-floor primary bedroom and split bedroom design, an open layout with a covered patio, kitchen with island, and walk-in pantry, plus a large laundry room. ​Options available to personalize this home include a formal dining room, several primary bath options, and an optional second floor with a bedroom, bath, and loft area.

homes_rtb.description: The Wescott is a three-bedroom, two-bath, ranch-style home with a formal dining room, kitchen with island and pantry, first-floor primary suite with shower and walk-in closet, a separate laundry room, and separate storage space in the garage. Options available to personalize this home include a second primary suite on the main level, dedicated office space, and an optional second floor with loft, bedroom, and full bath.

division.name: Columbia
division.subheadline: Premier home builder in the heart of the Palmetto State!
division.intro: New homes and townhomes for sale in South Carolina's capital.
division.description: Columbia, the capital city of South Carolina, is located in the heart of the midlands along the banks of the Congaree, Saluda, and Broad Rivers, with rolling hills and rich history of textile manufacturing and new industries including healthcare and technology. Home to the state's largest university, The University of South Carolina, and the state's largest zoo, the area is experiencing tremendous growth, including in neighboring cities such as Lexington, Blythewood, Chapin, and Irmo. Lake Murray, just west of Columbia, offers a get-away with fun in the sun, without having to get-away!

highlights.name: Lake Murray
highlights.description: Lake Murray, a 78-square mile lake in central South Carolina which borders Lexington, Chapin, and Irmo, and 23 other towns and municipalities, offers over 640 miles of shoreline and year round water fun on the lake. It's no wonder it earned the nickname "The Jewel of South Carolina."

highlights.name: Columbia Fireflies
highlights.description: The Columbia Fireflies are a minor league baseball team, based in Columbia, SC and is a Class A New York Mets affiliate. Fans of all ages enjoy popcorn, peanuts, and more every summer at the ball park!

highlights.name: Riverbanks Zoo
highlights.description: As South Carolina's top attraction, the Riverbanks Zoo and Garden offers over 2,000 animals and over 4,300 species of native and exotic plants for tourists and residents alike!
